channel.title: data-science-from-scratch on knapply()
channel.description: Recent content in data-science-from-scratch on knapply()

item.title: Central Tendency
item.description: Mean From Scratch How You Should Do It Median From Scratch Mean From Scratch R r_mean <- function(x) { sum(x) / length(x) } r_vector <- c(1.3, 3.8, 10.1, 2.5, 9.7) r_mean(r_vector) # [1] 5.48 Python def py_mean(x): return sum(x) / len(x) py_list = [1.3, 3.8, 10.1, 2.5, 9.7] result = py_mean(py_list) print(result) # 5.4799999999999995 C++

item.title: Bubble Sort
item.description: Python Unsorted list Bubble Sort Function Result R Unsorted vector Bubble Sort Function Result Environment Python Unsorted list unsorted = [9, 2, 8, 3, 7, 4, 6, 5, 1] Bubble Sort Function def bubble_sort(unsorted_sequence): sorted_sequence = unsorted_sequence for iteration, _ in enumerate(sorted_sequence): for i, _ in enumerate(sorted_sequence): if i + 1 <= len(sorted_sequence) - 1: current_value = sorted_sequence[i] next_value = sorted_sequence[i + 1] if current_value > next_value: sorted_sequence[i] = next_value sorted_sequence[i + 1] = current_value print(f'Iteration #{iteration + 1}: {", ".
